verses.verse: The LORD <S%H3068><s%> reigneth; <S%H4427><s%> let the people <S%H5971><s%> tremble: <S%H7264><s%> he sitteth <S%H3427><s%> between the cherubims; <S%H3742><s%> let the earth <S%H776><s%> be moved. <S%H5120><s%>
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> is great <S%H1419><s%> in Zion; <S%H6726><s%> and he <S%H1931><s%> is high <S%H7311><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the people. <S%H5971><s%>
Let them praise <S%H3034><s%> thy great <S%H1419><s%> and terrible <S%H3372><s%> name; <S%H8034><s%> for it <S%H1931><s%> is holy. <S%H6918><s%>

The king's <S%H4428><s%> strength <S%H5797><s%> also loveth <S%H157><s%> judgment; <S%H4941><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> dost establish <S%H3559><s%> equity, <S%H4339><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> executest <S%H6213><s%> judgment <S%H4941><s%> and righteousness <S%H6666><s%> in Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>
Exalt <S%H7311><s%> ye the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> and worship <S%H7812><s%> at his footstool; <S%H1916><s%> <S%H7272><s%> for he <S%H1931><s%> is holy. <S%H6918><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> among his priests, <S%H3548><s%> and Samuel <S%H8050><s%> among them that call upon <S%H7121><s%> his name; <S%H8034><s%> they called <S%H7121><s%> upon <S%H413><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and he <S%H1931><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> them.

He spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them in the cloudy <S%H6051><s%> pillar: <S%H5982><s%> they kept <S%H8104><s%> his testimonies, <S%H5713><s%> and the ordinance <S%H2706><s%> that he gave <S%H5414><s%> them.

Thou answeredst <S%H6030><s%> them, O LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God: <S%H430><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> wast <S%H1961><s%> a God <S%H410><s%> that forgavest <S%H5375><s%> them, though thou tookest vengeance <S%H5358><s%> of <S%H5921><s%> their inventions. <S%H5949><s%>

Exalt <S%H7311><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> and worship <S%H7812><s%> at his holy <S%H6944><s%> hill; <S%H2022><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> is holy. <S%H6918><s%>
